p: Representative concentration pathway 2.6 assumes that the global warming will increase from 0.4 to 1.6 and 0.3 to 1.7 Â°C between the years 2046 and 2064 and 2081 to 2100, respectively. RCP 2.6 also assumes that the mean global sea level will increase from 0.17 to 0.32 and 0.26 to 0.55 m, over the same periods ( Stocker et al., 2013).
